Content: Erica easily wrestles you to the ground.
COMMON_PLAYERNAME  "But I just let you go."
Erica  "We all make mistakes. I'm taking no chances now."
She mercilessly strips naked, binds, gags and hobbles you.
Erica  "Have you ever worn a hood before?"
A leather hood is laced tight over your head.
Tugging on your collar forces you to hobble forwards.
You soon feel a breeze and a lot colder.
Erica  "Don't worry, we are just going into town."
This is just a practical joke, isn't it???    Bad End.
